review_data.title: Perfect for tapas but with a hefty price tag
review_data.content: Almodobar is a popular after work hangout spot and for a reason. Their tapas list is impressive, even by strict Spanish standards. It is pricey given its central Zürich location but worth splashing out on for a special occassion.

review_data.title: Very much a cafe, bar in a business area
review_data.content: Very much a cafe, bar in a business area that happens to do lunch. Service was good, food choices too. Probably has a bit of an after work scene too. Parking nearby is not super easy.

review_data.title: Very popular venue for after-work drinks
